description.value:
• Cannot take [Combat] actions
  • Cannot take [Move] actions
  • Attacks against you have Fortune
  • Recovery: At the end of each turn, make [[/save type=will]]:
    • 2 successes: Downgrade to Frightened
    • 1 success: Downgrade to Fleeing
    • 0 successes: Remains Cowering
  • Ally Assistance: An ally within 5 feet can use an [Interact] action with Persuasion or [[/check skill=intimidate]]:
    • 2 successes: Downgrade to Frightened
    • 1 success: Downgrade to Fleeing

recovery.chatMessage: Make a [[/save type=will]] to recover from Cowering
